description: An alternate product suggested by the plan in response to the adjudication attempt. Adjudication records are used by Ambulatory Pharmacy during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: PREFERRED_PROD
columns.description: Alternate product recommended by the plan.

columns.name: PREFERRED_PROD_INCT
columns.description: Amount of pharmacy incentive available for substitution of preferred product.

columns.name: PREF_PROD_COPAY
columns.description: Amount of patient's copay/cost-share incentive for preferred product.

columns.name: PREF_PROD_DESC
columns.description: Description of the preferred product, provided by the Pharmacy Benefits Manager.

columns.name: I_PREF_PROD_QUAL_ID
columns.description: The code that qualifies the type of product ID submitted in Preferred Product ID (553-AR)

columns.name: I_PREF_PROD_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.
